field.name: summary
field.value: add method overloading support for ajaxactions

field.name: description
field.value:
Create a patch that adds (primitive) method overloading for actions tagged with the ajaxaction attribute.
things like: public void AddChildNode() .. public void AddChildNode(int root) .. public void AddChildNode(string root) ..
overloading is not native in js but there are workarounds that we can use.

comment.author: jsimons
comment.text: Not too sure about the use for this request. An example?

comment.author: jsimons
comment.text: Send us a pull request with a patch, and I'll reopen the issue.

comment.author: jsimons
